column4: NEED HELP i have a problem with x11 forwarding under lucid server. $DISPLAY and $HOST variable are empty and i get error :  cant open display -because its not set, sshd_config :x11 forwarding enabled
did you use ssh -X to ssh into the machine ?
so when you do echo $DISPLAY it returns null
debug1: Authentications that can continue: publickey
have you restarted sshd after configuring X forwardig onthe server, have you also made sure X11 forwarding is enabled in ssh_config
that's interesting, I'd certainly not expect DISPLAY to be empty on that
what happens if you manually set DISPLAY
well, having an X environment is pretty important to X11 forwarding, so thats a good thing to do
you'll need to run xhost + on the machine before that can work
but if you do xhost on the client that you're connected to the "broken" server on, does it work ?
it looks like X is broke some how on that server that question is how to take it fofrward
is there any chance you can actually start an X environmnet on that server ?
the X server is broken down into multiple components, there isn't such a thing as a "full" xserver these days
that's not a concern (unless you want to configure it to test it)
correct, I was just suggesting testing it to make sure you had the X11 components you need
it sounds like just this one server has a non-complete X11 install
